Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] Equipping an 'Inzektor' monster when the effect of "Inzektor Dragonfly" resolves is not activating a Spell Card. It's resolving a monster effect. So it cannot be negated by "Legendary Six Samurai - Shi En" or "Naturia Beast".

PSCT.Vegas:
① Once per turn: You can equip 1 "Inzektor" monster from your hand/GY to this card. 
② While this card is equipped to a monster, that monster's Level is increased by 3.
③ If an Equip Card(s) equipped to this card is sent to your GY (except in Damage Step): 
You can Special Summon 1 "Inzektor" monster from your Deck (except "Inzektor Dragonfly").

You can Special Summon 1 "Inzektor" monster from your Deck (except "Inzektor Dragonfly").

PSCT.Base: Once per turn: You can equip 1 "Inzektor" monster from your hand or Graveyard to this card. If an Equip Card(s) is sent to your Graveyard while equipped to this card (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon 1 "Inzektor" monster from your Deck, except "Inzektor Dragonfly". While this card is equipped to a monster, that monster's Level is increased by 3.
